SELECT * FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers LEFT JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers RIGHT JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id WHERE Products.price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price) FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY SUM(price) DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT DISTINCT contact_name FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_email IS NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%' AND supplier_name NOT LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT MAX(supplier_id) AS max_supplier_id FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name IN ('Supplier1', 'Supplier2', 'Supplier3');
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier1' AND contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name != 'Supplier1';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier1' UNION SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier2';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Inc' OR supplier_name LIKE '%Co.';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = (SELECT MAX(supplier_id) FROM Suppliers);
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name IN (SELECT supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%LLC%');
SELECT MIN(supplier_id) AS min_supplier_id, MAX(supplier_id) AS max_supplier_id FROM Suppliers;

SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, unit_price FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(unit_price * quantity_in_stock) AS total_value FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id LEFT JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity_ordered FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id RIGHT JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id WHERE quantity_ordered < 5;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id INNER JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id FULL JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id WHERE order_date IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(unit_price) AS max_unit_price FROM Products;
SELECT MIN(unit_price) AS min_unit_price FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(quantity_ordered) AS avg_quantity_ordered FROM Orders;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Orders;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_products > 3;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT p.product_name, p.unit_price, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT p.product_name, p.quantity_in_stock FROM Products p WHERE p.quantity_in_stock < 50;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT p.product_name, p.unit_price, SUM(o.quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM Products p JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, p.product_name, p.unit_price, o.quantity_ordered FROM Orders o JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT s.supplier_name, MAX(p.unit_price) AS max_unit_price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT s.supplier_name, AVG(p.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT p.product_name, p.unit_price, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.unit_price > 100;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT p.product_name, p.quantity_in_stock, o.quantity_ordered FROM Products p JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity_ordered > p.quantity_in_stock;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Suppliers s LEFT JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers s RIGHT JOIN Orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.product_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers UNION SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers INTERSECT SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers EXCEPT SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers s JOIN Orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.product_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers s JOIN Orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY s.supplier_name;

SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 500 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC

SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '456%' OR email IS NULL

SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT address_line, city, state, country FROM Addresses;
SELECT address_line, city, state, country FROM Addresses WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE order_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number, product_name, price FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, address_line, city, state, country, order_date, total_amount FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Addresses ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Addresses.supplier_id INNER JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_date, amount FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Payments ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Payments.order_id;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price, order_date, total_amount FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id INNER JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM Addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount = 200;

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price * total_amount) AS revenue FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id INNER JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id GROUP BY Suppliers.supplier_name ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Suppliers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, p.product_name FROM Orders o JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT a.address_line, a.city, a.state, a.country, s.supplier_name FROM Addresses a JOIN Suppliers s ON a.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT p.product_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount, pp.amount FROM Products p JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN Payments pp ON o.order_id = pp.order_id;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(p.product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers s LEFT JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM Orders GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(DISTINCT city) AS unique_cities FROM Suppliers s JOIN Addresses a ON s.supplier_id = a.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM Suppliers s JOIN (SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id) AS op ON s.supplier_id = op.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT supplier_name, MAX(amount) AS largest_payment FROM Suppliers s JOIN (SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id) AS op ON s.supplier_id = op.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT supplier_id, product_name, total_amount, payment_date FROM Suppliers s JOIN (SELECT * FROM Products p JOIN (SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Payments pp ON o.order_id = pp.order_id) AS op ON p.product_id = op.product_id) AS po ON s.supplier_id = po.supplier_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, p.product_name, o.order_date, pp.amount FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN Payments pp ON o.order_id = pp.order_id;

SELECT s.supplier_name, a.city, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN Addresses a ON s.supplier_id = a.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, a.city;

SELECT s.supplier_name, a.city, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN Addresses a ON s.supplier_id = a.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, a.city HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_date, amount FROM Suppliers s JOIN (SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id) AS op ON s.supplier_id = op.supplier_id WHERE amount > 500;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date, total_amount, payment_date, amount FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN Payments pp ON o.order_id = pp.order_id WHERE total_amount > 5000 AND amount > 1000;
